notes.title: Update
notes.text:
- Added Scalability! Added a related icon to Taskbar.
- Added Currency Rate display to Notification panel (currency.poe.trade support).
- Added "Still interested in ITEM for PRICE?" button to Notification panel.
- Added League name display to Notification panel.
- Fixed reported bugs and issues you guys had.
- Minor yet numerous improvements.
If you enjoy the app and it makes your life a bit happier consider supporting it!
